# annotationSubtitles(_:)

**Instance Method**

Sets the visibility of subtitles for markers and annotations.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency func annotationSubtitles(_ visibility: Visibility) -> some MapContent

```

## Parameters

- **visibility**: One of the `Visibility` settings. The default is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/SwiftUI/Visibility/automatic], which results in the subtitle being visible only when the annotation is in a selected state.

## Return Value

Returns [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MapContent] whose subtitles have the visibility setting you specified.

## Supplying annotation titles

- **annotationTitles(_:)**: Sets the visibility of titles for markers and annotations.
